sentence: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth
answer: בְּרֵאשִׁ֖ית בָּרָ֣א אֱלֹהִ֑ים אֵ֥ת הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם וְאֵ֥ת הָאָֽרֶץ
title: Genesis 1

sentence: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one.
answer: שְׁמַ֖ע יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל יְהוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ יְהוָ֥ה׀ אֶחָֽד
title: Deuteronomy 6:4

sentence: Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.
answer: וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ אֵ֖ת יְהוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ בְּכָל־ לְבָבְךָ֥ וּבְכָל־ נַפְשְׁךָ֖ וּבְכָל־ מְאֹדֶֽךָ
title: Deuteronomy 6:5
